title: How to Join a Drag Event in Need for Speed

methods.name: Joining a Drag Event in NFS: Carbon (PC)

steps.headline: Launch the game.
steps.description: You can launch the game from the Start Menu (Start Button >> All Programs >> Electronic Arts >> Need for Speed Carbon) or from the desktop by double-clicking its icon.

steps.headline: Press Enter once the game loads.
steps.description: You will be directed to the main menu.

steps.headline: Choose the first option, Career, on the main menu.
steps.description: Do this by simply pressing Enter.

steps.headline: Press Enter to choose “Resume Career” on the Career menu.
steps.description: This will take you to your most recently accessed Safe House. A Safe House is a hideout in the game where you can escape the cops, view the World Map, and manage your cars.

steps.headline: Select the first option, World Map, on the menu by pressing Enter.
steps.description: This will allow you to view a map of the city with all the events currently available. The map is demarcated into territories, each of which are controlled by a rival racing crew in NFS Carbon.

steps.headline: Select a territory.
steps.description: Use the Left, Right, Up, and Down Arrow keys to scroll between different territories on the map, and press Enter to select a territory. This will allow you to browse all events available in that territory.

steps.headline: Select a drag event.
steps.description: Use the Up and Down Arrow keys to scroll all events in the territory you selected. Types of events include drags, circuits, sprints, and checkpoints. When you find a drag event, press Enter to select it. A message will pop up asking you to whether you wish to jump to that event.

steps.headline: Select “Jump to the Event” and press Enter.
steps.description: This will take you to the drag event.

steps.headline: Race in the drag event.
steps.description: To drive, use the Up Arrow key (acceleration), Down Arrow key (brake/reverse), Left Arrow key (steer left), and Right Arrow key (steer right).

methods.name: Joining a Drag Event in NFS: Underground 2 (PC)

steps.headline: Launch the game.
steps.description: You can launch the game from the Start Menu (Start Button >> All Programs >> Electronic Arts >> Need for Speed Underground 2) or from the desktop by double-clicking its icon.

steps.headline: Press Enter once the game loads.
steps.description: You will be directed to the main menu.

steps.headline: Choose Career on the main menu.
steps.description: This is the first option, you can select it by simply pressing Enter.

steps.headline: Press Enter to choose “Resume Career” on the Career menu.
steps.description: This will take you to your most recently accessed Safe House.

steps.headline: Scroll rightwards (Right Arrow key) and select “World Map” by pressing Enter.
steps.description: This will display a list of all available racing events on a left side pane while showing a route preview of each race on the right side of the screen..

steps.headline: Select a drag event.
steps.description: Use the Up and Down Arrow keys to scroll between the different events on the list. When you find a drag event, press Enter to select  it. Other types of racing events include circuit races, and sprint races.

steps.headline: Choose “Yes” on the confirmation dialog box that appears.
steps.description: The drag race will begin. To drive, use the Up Arrow key (acceleration), Down Arrow key (brake/reverse), Left Arrow key (steer left), and Right Arrow key (steer right).

text: Joining a Drag Event in NFS: Carbon (PC) Launch the game. You can launch the game from the Start Menu (Start Button >> All Programs >> Electronic Arts >> Need for Speed Carbon) or from the desktop by double-clicking its icon. Press Enter once the game loads. You will be directed to the main menu. Choose the first option, Career, on the main menu. Do this by simply pressing Enter. Press Enter to choose “Resume Career” on the Career menu. This will take you to your most recently accessed Safe House. A Safe House is a hideout in the game where you can escape the cops, view the World Map, and manage your cars. Select the first option, World Map, on the menu by pressing Enter. This will allow you to view a map of the city with all the events currently available. The map is demarcated into territories, each of which are controlled by a rival racing crew in NFS Carbon. Select a territory. Use the Left, Right, Up, and Down Arrow keys to scroll between different territories on the map, and press Enter to select a territory. This will allow you to browse all events available in that territory. Select a drag event. Use the Up and Down Arrow keys to scroll all events in the territory you selected. Types of events include drags, circuits, sprints, and checkpoints. When you find a drag event, press Enter to select it. A message will pop up asking you to whether you wish to jump to that event. Select “Jump to the Event” and press Enter. This will take you to the drag event. Race in the drag event. To drive, use the Up Arrow key (acceleration), Down Arrow key (brake/reverse), Left Arrow key (steer left), and Right Arrow key (steer right). Joining a Drag Event in NFS: Underground 2 (PC) Launch the game. You can launch the game from the Start Menu (Start Button >> All Programs >> Electronic Arts >> Need for Speed Underground 2) or from the desktop by double-clicking its icon. Press Enter once the game loads. You will be directed to the main menu. Choose Career on the main menu. This is the first option, you can select it by simply pressing Enter. Press Enter to choose “Resume Career” on the Career menu. This will take you to your most recently accessed Safe House. Scroll rightwards (Right Arrow key) and select “World Map” by pressing Enter. This will display a list of all available racing events on a left side pane while showing a route preview of each race on the right side of the screen.. Select a drag event. Use the Up and Down Arrow keys to scroll between the different events on the list. When you find a drag event, press Enter to select  it. Other types of racing events include circuit races, and sprint races. Choose “Yes” on the confirmation dialog box that appears. The drag race will begin.
